src:
Vulgarnega Zmaga Jelinčiča iz tira vrgla ženska v krilu
Na semaforjih za pešce boste po novem lahko videli tudi lik ženske v krilu.
03 Nov 2019, 07:01 by A. L.
LJUBLJANA – Ste se kdaj spraševali, zakaj je na semaforju za pešce lik, ki spominja na moškega, in zakaj nikoli ni ženske? Če ste se, potem vas lahko potolažimo. Delo je namreč poročalo, da bo po novem na semaforjih za pešce dovoljeno uporabiti tudi silhueto z ženskim likom s krilom.Nekateri so nad tem navdušeni, spet drugi pravijo, da ne nosijo vse ženske kril. Po ministrici za infrastrukturo, ki je podpisana pod pravilnik in ki te spremembe omogoča, Alenki Bratušek, pa je udaril opozicijski poslanec Zmago Jelinčič Plemeniti.Zapisal je: » A se je Alenčici zmešalo?   Spremenila bo znak na semaforju tako, da ne bomo vedeli ali kdo hodi ali kakšna pijana baba ščije.   Kaj tako norega si ne morejo izmisliti niti v multi-kulti Švedski. «
text:
The vulgar Victory Jelinčič was thrown from the track by a woman in her lap
At pedestrian traffic lights, you can also see the figure of a woman in her lap.
03 Nov 2019, 07:01 by A.L.
LJUBLJANA - Ever wondered why a pedestrian-friendly character resembles a man at a traffic light and why he's never a woman? If you are, then we can comfort you. The work reported that pedestrians will also be allowed to use the silhouette of a female figure with a skirt. Some are excited about this, but others say that not all women wear wings. According to the Minister of Infrastructure, who is signed under the regulations and who allows these changes, Alenka Bratusek, the opposition MP Zmago Jelincic Noble struck. She will change the sign at the traffic light so that we do not know if anyone is walking or what a drunken grandmother of a scepter is. They can't even invent something so crazy in multi-cult Sweden. «
